programme.desc: This wartime drama centres on a lonely Shanghai widow (Cora Miao) and the Hong Kong playboy (Chow Yun-Fat) who decides to court her.

programme.title: Kung Fu Monster
programme.desc: In the waning years of the Ming dynasty, a government official is forced to team up with a band of thieves to capture monsters that have escaped from the royal palace.

programme.title: Summer Love Love
programme.desc: Three very different men from Hong Kong, who are desperately lonely, end up facing countless challenges when they decide to seek love in Hainan, China.

programme.title: Miao Miao
programme.desc: An awkward young beauty enchants her outgoing classmate. Unfortunately, she falls in love with a someone else instead and decides to quietly pursue him.

programme.title: Wu Kong
programme.desc: Eddie Peng charms as possibly the most handsome Monkey King alongside Shawn Yue & Ni Ni in this fantasy-action-adventure film.

programme.title: The Lady Improper
programme.desc: A woman is left by her husband due to her fear of intimacy. While finding her feet in her father's restaurant, she gets attracted to the new chef, a free spirit who helps liberate her.

programme.title: Knockout
programme.desc: After his incarceration, a former boxer learns that his wife has passed away, leaving behind a sick daughter. To get her to undergo treatment, he agrees to step into the ring again.

programme.title: Vanguard
programme.desc: Vanguard, a covert private security, is tasked with protecting an accountant targeted by deadly mercenaries. In the process, they also discover another dangerous conspiracy.

programme.title: Horseplay
programme.desc: While covering a smuggling case in London, TV host Ha Mui meets a thief and a washed-out detective. They have different goals but must work together to retrieve the missing artefact.

programme.title: The Eagle Shooting Heroes
programme.desc: Loosely based on Louis Cha's classics, this rom com is about a power struggle between a Queen's treasonous lover and a princess amid slapstick battles and musical numbers.

programme.title: Paradox
programme.desc: A winner of Hong Kong Film Awards, Paradox stars Louis Koo as a police inspector who takes on a vicious Thai syndicate in search of his lost daughter.

programme.title: A Beautiful Moment
programme.desc: This drama depicts a heartbreaker who has countless female partners. However, when he unexpectedly develops feelings for the first time, an intriguing love story begins.

programme.title: Big Brother
programme.desc: Donnie Yen stars as a soldier recruited for his toughest mission yet - teaching a class of teen delinquents. As he changes their lives, his unconventional teaching style may be just what they need.

programme.title: Sound of Colors
programme.desc: Based on the book by famed Taiwan illustrator Jimmy Liao, this drama depicts how two visually challenged people find love & strength in a dark world.
